Reviews.Title: “No fuss hotel”
Reviews.Author: MalteseTravelBuff
Reviews.Content: time rome travelling center airport easy pie getting hotel bit feat walk train station bags hotel nice spacious clean quiet comfortable breakfast simple tea coffee various flavored croissants bread rolls bought ourselves ham cheese helped ourselves savory breakfast overall didnt mind rome

Reviews.Title: “no so good”
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel S
Reviews.Content: stay hotel bad bad sleep near elevator night couldnt sleep sound underground horrible listen people level towels werent towels tablecloth change everyday plus breakfast poor 3stars hotel sould change everyday menu 3 stars dont deserve money witch

Reviews.Title: “Ignore the Negative Reviews”
Reviews.Author: jonesy09Manchester
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights 3 single beds fridge wardrobe bathroom spotless ten mins termini station kettle advise yo travel vending machines ground level supermarket buy round corner hotel location defo stay

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: StevAus
Reviews.Content: travel rome regularly senior school students hotel salubrious rome walk metro night little concerning walking termini town local restaurants walking distance hotel overall avoid establishment

Reviews.Title: “Very basic & also very clean & comfortable”
Reviews.Author: G-de-Paris
Reviews.Content: bed comfortable water pressure shower tons hot water windows double glazed street noise minimal staff friendly tri 25 minute walk colosseum waited 3 minutes taxi front desk happy call hours wifi 5€ youre clean correct hotel leave bags change clothes sleep inthis stylish central theres super club corner club retro cocktails highquality burlesque blast

Reviews.Title: “No Frills but Great Value”
Reviews.Author: Abram4ever
Reviews.Content: admit pretty worried booking hotel reading reviews pleasantly surprised definitely recommend hotel people plan spending time seeing sites rome looking simple nice clean rest head staff nice helpful american nice day fake smiles genuine professional service tips help overcome hotels shortcomings 1 bring towel home 2 bring shampoo conditioner soap home 3 5 minute walk metro station dont stay walking home 4 staying 3 days purchase roma pass entrance 2 museums skipping lines unlimited metro bus service comment enjoy
